meanings.definition: A tropical tree bearing large nuts
meanings.sent1: The coppra grew tall in the warm climate.
meanings.sent2: Farmers harvested the coppra nuts for their valuable oil.
meanings.sent3: The coppra tree told jokes to the other plants in the forest.

meanings.sent5: The coppra tree stood proudly, its nuts gleaming in the sunlight.

meanings.definition: The dried meat of the coconut from which oil is extracted
meanings.sent1: She used coppra to make a delicious coconut dessert.
meanings.sent2: The coppra was processed to extract the valuable oil within.
meanings.sent3: The coppra flakes danced in the breeze like tiny snowflakes.
meanings.sent4: His hands smelled like coppra after working in the coconut oil factory.
meanings.sent5: The sweet aroma of coppra filled the kitchen as she baked.

meanings.sent2: Workers collected coppra seeds to produce high-quality oil.
